content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: Certificate
metadata:
  name: your-certificate
  namespace: your-namespace
spec:
  secretName: your-secret
  issuerRef:
    name: ssl-issuer
    kind: ClusterIssuer
  dnsNames:
    - your-hostname

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: ClusterIssuer
metadata:
  name: acme-issuer
spec:
  acme:
    email: your-email@address
		server: https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory
    privateKeySecretRef:
      name: example-issuer-account-key
    solvers:
    	- dns01:
        	cloudflare:
          	email: your-email@address
          	apiKeySecretRef:
        			name: cloudflare-api-key-secret
        			key: api-key     
          selector:
          dnsZones:
            - 'your-domain'

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: ClusterIssuer
metadata:
  name: selfsigned-issuer
spec:
  selfSigned: {}

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: cloudflare-api-key-secret
  namespace: cert-manager
type: Opaque
stringData:
  api-key: your-api-key

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: ingress
  # namespace: your-namespace
spec:
  rules:
  - host: "your-hostname"
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: your-service-name 
            port:
              number: 80
  # tls:
  # - hosts:
  #   - your-hostname.com
  #   secretName: your-secret

content.label: Fragment 1
content.value:
apiVersion: traefik.containo.us/v1alpha1
kind: IngressRouteTCP
metadata:
  name: ingressroutetcp
  # namespace: your-namespace
spec:
  entryPoints:
  - web
  - websecure
  routes:
  - match: HostSNI(`your-hostname-sni`)
    priority: 10
    services:
    - name: your-service
      port: 80
  # tls:
  #   passthrough: true
